Articles.Content:
So last time I played I had this annoying thing happen: I landed in the water and one of my intakes decided to become a dolphin. It started to jump and wouldn't stop 'til the heat death of the universe. I had some other stuff in sight and once I switched the vessels with [ and ] I couldn't switch back to my main vessel although it was 300 meters away. Maybe a right-click switch to would help. Maybe not. But it also would be a nice thing in space. Wouldnt have to jump between everything and choose just the thing we want to control.

Hope this post is clear enough to understand. Things I say tend to be really chaotic.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-03T12:16:10Z" title="04/03/2015 12:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 3, 2015</time> by Veeltch**
They could also look at fixing buoyancy in KSP.
